targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DeviceBatteryLevel")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HeartRate_Intraday")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> movingAverage(n: 6)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HeartRate_Intraday")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 95)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> movingAverage(n: 6)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HeartRate_Intraday")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 105)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> movingAverage(n: 6)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HeartRate_Intraday")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] < 60)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> movingAverage(n: 6)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "RestingHR")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Steps_Intraday")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> movingAverage(n: 6)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Total Steps")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SPO2_Intraday")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SPO2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "avg")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Levels")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesAsleep")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Levels")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesDeep")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["isMainSleep"] == "True")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesLight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["isMainSleep"] == "True")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesREM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["isMainSleep"] == "True")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesAwake")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["isMainSleep"] == "True")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesDeep")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["isMainSleep"] == "True")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Skin Temperature Variation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "RelativeValue")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesDeep")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["isMainSleep"] == "True")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesLight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["isMainSleep"] == "True")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesREM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["isMainSleep"] == "True")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesAwake")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["isMainSleep"] == "True")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Levels")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "RestingHR")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HRV")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dailyRmssd")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SPO2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "avg")

list.description: Determines the time zone for grouping by day
list.label: Time Zone
list.name: TimeZone
